snippet: Yiadom Boakye set up the equalizer and scored a late winner as Ghana came from behind to beat Portugal and reach the quarterfinals of the under-20 World Cup in Istanbul.
abstract: Ghana defeats Portugal, 3-2, to advance to soccer's under-20 World Cup quarterfinals; other soccer news noted.

byline.original: By THE ASSOCIATED PRESS and JACK BELL

lead_paragraph: Yiadom Boakye set up the equalizer and scored a late winner as Ghana came from behind to beat Portugal and reach the quarterfinals of the under-20 World Cup in Istanbul.

headline.main: Ghana Advances in Under-20 World Cup
headline.print_headline: Ghana Advances in Under-20 World Cup
